content:
Use the uploaded image exactly as the base/reference. Do not change the subjects’ faces, poses, camera angle, or composition. Preserve facial features and expression. Recreate a vertical cinematic movie-poster based on this image with the following specifications:
Canvas: vertical poster, aspect ratio 2:3 (e.g. 4000×6000 px). High-res, photoreal, print-quality (minimum 300 DPI).
Composition: keep the ship’s bow centered and dominating the lower two-thirds; keep the couple faded and large in the top third as in the uploaded image (overlay/blend). Do not move or re-pose subjects.
Lighting & mood: cinematic golden-hour rim light on faces, soft warm highlights, cool deep shadows on the hull; strong contrast with gentle atmospheric mist; subtle film grain and slight vignette for vintage cinematic look.
Color grade: warm skin highlights, slightly desaturated midtones, deep navy/charcoal hull, soft cyan sky with white cloud details; natural skin texture preserved (no smoothing).
Ship details: maintain the bow’s perspective and railing lines; add realistic water spray/splash at the hull base, small white foam particles; keep deck rail details sharp.
Overlay blend: the couple at the top should be semi-translucent, softly feathered into the sky; maintain original hair, jewelry, and clothing details.
Title & typography: center the single word {argument name="title" default="TITANIC"} across the bottom third in large serif (Trajan Pro / classic film serif), all caps, wide tracking, pure white with subtle drop shadow and tiny bevel; place title exactly like the reference.
Effects/finishing: increase perceived sharpness on ship hull and title; keep couple slightly softer; apply subtle film grain, mild chromatic aberration, and filmic contrast curve.
Negative constraints: no additional people or logos, no modern artifacts (phones, text), no watermark, no unnatural skin smoothness, no heavy plastic look.
For img2img parameters (suggested): strength 0.35–0.55, preserve composition, seed optional for reproducibility. Output: 4000×6000 PNG, lossless.
Instruction to renderer: Use the uploaded photo as the primary source and only refine/augment per the above — do not replace or re-render faces or change the original pose/composition.

content:
Consistent character from reference image: exact same face, hairstyle, body shape, and original outfit. NO redesign.

[Composition & Pose]:
Heroic and exaggerated anime stance, waist-up framing, front-facing. Arms tightly crossed, chest pushed forward, leaning slightly towards the camera to create intense pressure. High visual density.

[Expression]:
Explosive emotion, intense anger mixed with determination. Mouth wide open shouting, eyebrows sharply angled, piercing eyes with sharp highlights.

[Dynamic Motion]:
A violent upward wind blasting from below the character,
powerful vertical airflow pushing both fabric and hair upward and outward.
The original clothing from the reference image remains intact and reacts naturally to the force,
all loose parts of the outfit whipping and flaring aggressively,
the character’s hair is lifted, blown upward, and spread by the same updraft,
hair strands follow the vertical flow with dynamic, forceful motion,
movement extends beyond the frame,
the motion feels heavy, chaotic, and explosive,
as if the character is standing in a violent upward draft.

[Art Style]:
Bold anime illustration, thick and rough energetic linework, expressive hand-drawn strokes. High contrast, dramatic cel-shading. Focus on raw emotion and impact.

[Background & Text]:
Solid white background.
Behind the character, ONE single instance of large handwritten Japanese brush text.
The text must appear ONCE only, not repeated, not duplicated.
All characters must be fully visible, complete, and readable.
No missing strokes, no cropped characters, no broken parts.

The text is continuous and written as one complete phrase:
“{argument name="dialogue" default="Who the hell do you think I am!"}”

Pure hand-painted brush lettering, NOT a font.
Wild, uneven brush strokes with controlled ink splatter and wobble,
but the structure of each character remains intact. Black ink only.

[Technical]:
High-impact poster visual, anime key visual style, ultra-high resolution, 8k.

Batman cowl side

content: Transform the uploaded image into a high-impact digital illustration using the image as a strict facial reference. Face Match (Strict): Face match must remain 100% exact — identical facial structure, proportions, jawline, cheekbones, nose shape, lips, beard density(if available in reference image) and trim, skin texture, hairline, hairstyle, and overall identity. Do not beautify, stylize, or alter facial features. Subject & Pose: A young Eastern European man is shown in a clean side-profile pose (not extreme profile), facing toward the right side of the frame. His head is slightly raised, chin gently lifted, conveying confidence, ambition, and forward vision. Expression is calm and self-assured. Clothing & Styling: The subject wears formal, modern clothing — a tailored dark blazer over a crisp shirt, minimal and elegant, reinforcing a professional and ambitious persona. No distracting accessories. Key Visual Element: He wears bold orange reflective sunglasses as the focal point. The lenses reflect a detailed modern cityscape with skyscrapers, urban roads, and green trees, symbolizing vision, ambition, and future goals. Color & Illustration Style: The face and clothing are rendered in muted grayscale tones, with realistic texture translated into a refined digital illustration style. content:
Real human body + spiritual light phantom behind

Overall Style and Quality
Visual Style: Top-tier realistic cultivation scroll, surreal cinematic commercial blockbuster, hardcore Eastern fantasy aesthetic.
Core Parameters: 8K ultra-high resolution, film texture, real skin texture (rejecting plastic/anime feel).
Physical Rules: Realistic light and shadow simulation, emphasizing the character's gravity and physical feedback in a specific environment.
Composition Strategy: Ultra-wide horizontal composition. The twelve Zodiac incarnations are arranged scattered from left to right in the same grand immortal realm, with no visual blind spots.
Unified Worldview: The scene is set in the unified “Hongmeng Immortal Realm.” The environment gradually transitions from the chaotic spiritual veins on the left to the sea of clouds and immortal traces on the right. All characters share the same set of atmospheric light and shadow; the actual Zodiac animals are strictly prohibited from appearing.

Core Visual Features
• Character Form: All figures are real human forms with extremely high aesthetic value, retaining human facial features and skin texture.
• Zodiac Representation: Zodiac characteristics are embodied through the characters' clothing tailoring, color details, personal magical treasures, and the grand “Beast Spirit/Martial Soul” phantom composed of pure spiritual light behind the character.
• Beast Spirit Manifestation: The Beast Spirit appears as a translucent light state or phantom, entirely woven from flowing spiritual energy and radiance, lacking physical texture, enveloping the character from behind and above like a miracle, full of divinity.

Photography and Lighting
• Equipment: Canon EOS R5, 35mm prime lens.
• Lighting Design: Uniformly illuminated by the “Immortal Realm Morning Glow,” light enters from one side of the frame, creating the Tyndall effect.
• Ambient Light Compensation: The Beast Spirit light and shadow behind the character emit a soft innate spiritual light, refracting with the clouds, mist, and sword energy in the immortal realm.

Character Distribution and Detailed Description
1. Rat (Water): Far right, sea of clouds. Human form is a nimble youth in dark attire, with a massive, light-translucent Rat phantom suspended behind, eyes alert.
2. Ox (Earth): A steady, strong man in dark bronze heavy armor. Behind him stands a mountain-like Azure Ox light phantom, demonstrating the power to lift mountains.
3. Tiger (Wood): A dominant commander in a black and gold tiger-striped robe. Behind him is a Tiger Spirit light phantom, with flowing light and shadow, seemingly descending from the mountain.
4. Rabbit (Wood): A cool, ethereal fairy in a moon-white flowing immortal dress. Accompanied by a Jade Rabbit phantom, entirely condensed from white light and emitting soft radiance, creating an ethereal atmosphere.
5. Dragon (Metal): Occupying a high position, in a dark dragon scale robe, supremely noble. Behind him coils a hundred-zhang long, majestic and sacred Giant Dragon spiritual light phantom.
6. Snake (Fire): A seductive mystic in a purple snake-patterned satin robe. Behind her slithers a long, deep, Spiritual Snake phantom composed of purple flowing light.
7. Horse (Fire): A valiant sword cultivator in crimson battle gear. Behind him is a fiery Steed light phantom, hooves treading fire, ready to gallop.
8. Sheep (Earth): A gentle healer in a beige cotton and linen immortal dress. Behind her appears a peaceful, hazy White Sheep light phantom, like auspicious clouds.
9. Monkey (Metal): An untamed battle expert in battle-damaged gold armor. Behind him is a Monkey Spirit light phantom, holding a divine weapon and looking down upon the world.
10. Rooster (Metal): The dawn watcher, in a feather-cut battle robe. Wings spread behind him, revealing a flowing gold, radiant Phoenix light phantom, like a mirage.
11. Dog (Earth): A loyal general in leather and metal light armor. Behind him is an upright, protective Spiritual Dog light phantom.
12. Pig (Water): Far left, by the spiritual spring. A leisurely immortal in loose blue robes. Behind him swirls a deeply blessed Spiritual Pig phantom, composed of rich aura.

Final Vision
This is no longer a collection of isolated individuals, but an epic assembly of the twelve Zodiac deities in a unified immortal realm. Through the visual structure of “Real Human Body + Spiritual Light Phantom Behind,” it perfectly balances the emotional beauty of humans with the mythological depth of the Zodiac, constructing the ultimate Eastern fantasy universe.

content:
[PERSON NAME].
Act as a high-end sports graphic designer creating a conceptual tribute poster. The style is a complex "dual exposure photo-grid composite" with mixed-media textures.
CENTRAL STRUCTURE (THE VESSEL):
The central focus is a large-scale, high-contrast black and white portrait silhouette of {argument name="person name" default="[PERSON NAME]"}. This main portrait acts as the container.
THE GRID FILL & TEXTURES (MIXED MEDIA):
The interior of the silhouette is populated by a dense "photo mosaic grid" of action shots from the person's career.
CRITICAL TEXTURE INSTRUCTION: Do not just paste flat photos. Apply artistic textures to various grid cells to create a tactile, collage feel. Use effects like:
Halftone Dots: Comic-book style raster patterns on some cells.
Fabric/Embroidery: Subtle thread or canvas textures suggesting a jersey or patch.
Film Grain: Heavy noise on specific high-contrast action shots.
COLOR STRATEGY:
The base is Monochrome B&W. Use selective color overlays (relevant to the team/flag) ONLY on specific grid cells to create a rhythm.
TYPOGRAPHY & BRANDING (STRICT MICRO-SCALING):
Top Left (The Name): Write "{argument name="person name 2" default="[PERSON NAME]"}" strictly using the font Inter Semibold.
Kerning: Tight negative kerning (-4%).
Size: SMALL and discreet. It must occupy MAXIMUM 20% of the canvas width. Do NOT make it large or loud.
Top Right (The Symbol): Place the primary logo (Team/Brand/Flag).
Size: VERY SMALL. It must occupy MAXIMUM 10% of the canvas width.
COMPOSITION & BACKGROUND:
Background: Off-white or light grey with a visible high-quality paper or concrete texture. It should not be flat digital white.
Alignment: Center the figure perfectly. Maintain wide negative space around the object.

Generate a high-end, vertical format Movie Poster. Act as an expert Art Director and execute the following prompt based strictly on the defined INPUT VARIABLES and any ATTACHED IMAGES.

{VAR_TITLE}: [{argument name="movie title" default="INSERT MOVIE TITLE HERE"}]

SUBJECT & REFERENCE HANDLING (CONDITIONAL LOGIC):

IF IMAGES ARE ATTACHED: You must use the attached images as the primary visual reference. The protagonist on the poster must STRICTLY maintain the facial features, likeness, and physical attributes of the reference images.

Aspect Ratio: Vertical (9:16 or 2:3)

content:
Ultimate Integrated Prompt - 'British Vogue' Fashion Magazine Cover Edition
Reference Image 1 Look × Reference Image 2 High-End Gentleman Aesthetic

[Core Directive]
As a world-class fashion photographer (Steven Meisel/Paolo Roversi/Peter Lindbergh), create a high-end fashion portrait suitable for the cover style of 'British Vogue' for **[the person in Reference Image 1]**.
Four Core Requirements:

1. Strictly reproduce 100% of the external features of the person in Reference Image 1 (hair style, facial contours, features, age perception, body type, etc.) (without any pre-settings or assumptions).
2. Transformation of dignified elegance (The original temperament of the person in Reference Figure 1 → transformed into the aura of a relaxed, high-end fashion gentleman).
3. Fully incorporate the visual DNA of Reference Figure 2 (seated posture with hand supporting the cheek, fine pinstripe suit, folding chair, pure white background, monochrome tone, relaxed and sophisticated atmosphere).
4. Allow creative fine-tuning (flexible adjustments permitted while maintaining the core aesthetic).

[I. Subject Appearance Reproduction - Reference Figure 1]
✅ Absolute Principle: Reproduce Reference Figure 1 100%
Features that must be completely retained:

Hair style: Hair length, color, style, curl degree, hairline, volume, etc. - Complete match
Face shape: Contour, width, jawline, facial proportions - Complete retention
Five senses: Shape, size, position, and proportion of eyes, nose, lips, ears - Complete match
Skin: Skin color, texture, moles, scars, blemishes, etc. - Complete retention
Age characteristics: Wrinkles, fine lines, under-eye bags, nasolabial folds, etc. - Realistically reproduced
Body type: Proportion, shoulder width, overall physique - Complete retention
Unique characteristics: Individual specific facial or physical characteristics

❌ Absolute Prohibitions:

No external feature of Reference Image 1 shall be altered
Reference Image 1 features shall not be 'optimized' or 'beautified'
No pre-setting or assumption of how Reference Image 1 should look
Reference Image 1's appearance shall not be changed due to the style of Reference Image 2

✅ Verification Criteria:

Viewers who know the person in Reference Figure 1 must instantly recognize them as the same person
Facial feature similarity must be 95% or higher
Failure if pointed out that the image does not resemble Reference Figure 1

[II. Expression and Atmosphere - Dignified and Relaxed Gentleman]
Direction of Atmosphere Transformation:
Core Emotional Keywords:

'Relaxed confidence'
'Sophistication in idleness'
'Subtle high-end feel'
'Artistic distance'
'The composure of a fashionable gentleman'

Facial Expression (Reference Figure 2 style):
Gaze:

✅ Slightly raise the gaze and look straight at the camera

A gentle yet sharp gaze
Conveying 'I am relaxed, but aware of my charm'
An observant eye with artistic distance
Not exaggerated, effortless, and not flattering

Mouth:

✅ Lightly tighten the corners of the mouth or close naturally

No smiling, not serious
A completely relaxed, natural state
Conveying 'subtle sophistication'
Slightly pursing the lips is also an option (restrained elegance)

Overall Facial Impression:

✅ Completely relax the facial muscles

No tension or deliberate movement whatsoever
Natural, relaxed, and composed state
Conveying the message 'I don't need to prove anything'

✅ Naturally express skin texture

Realistic texture while applying moderate correction
High-end and refined, but authentic texture

Emotional Guidance by Director:

'You are the person on the cover of Vogue. You are very relaxed.'
'You are not posing; you are just sitting here.'
'Your languor is real, not an act.'
'Fashion is about relaxing, not striving.'

[III. Core Pose - Seated Posture with Hand Supporting Cheek (Reference Figure 2 Standard Pose)]
Iconic Pose:
Sitting on a folding chair:

✅ Sitting Style:

Sitting on a simple metal folding chair
Body slightly leaning forward or naturally upright
Legs naturally spread (shoulder-width or slightly wider)
Both feet placed flat on the ground

Hand Posture (Core Feature):

✅ Supporting the cheek with one hand (Refer to Figure 2 standard):

Place the elbow of the right or left hand on the thigh of the same side
Support the chin/cheek with the palm or fingers
An impression of sophistication despite appearing casual
Expressing a state of 'contemplation' or 'leisurely waiting'

✅ The other hand:

Naturally placed on the backrest/armrest of the chair
Or naturally hanging down
Or lightly placed on the opposite thigh

Significance of Posture:

Breaking the formality of stiffness
Creating a fashionable look of 'relaxed high-end feel'
Conveying the message 'Thinking about art/life'
Everyday object (folding chair) + High-end styling = Contrast aesthetic

Body Posture:

Relax the shoulders (do not raise them)
Naturally curve the spine (do not stiffen)
Overall conveying comfort, naturalness, and composure

Head Posture:

Head slightly turned sideways (5-15 degrees)
Or facing the camera straight on
Naturally tilted according to the position of the hand supporting the cheek

[IV. Styling Design - High-End Fashion Formal]
Attire (Refined Formal + Relaxed Details):
Core Item - Fine Pinstripe Suit (Reference Figure 2 Standard):

✅ Jacket:

Fine pinstripe in a {argument name="suit color" default="dark color"} (black/dark gray/navy)
Slim fit or standard silhouette
Double-breasted or single-breasted
Lapels are sharp, shoulder line is crisp

✅ Trousers:

Fine pinstripe of the same pattern as the jacket
High waist, slim fit or straight
Cuffed hem (Refer to Figure 2 important detail)

Cuff the hem 1-2 times
Exposing the ankles and socks
Softening the formality and adding a relaxed fashion feel

✅ Shirt:

White formal shirt
Collar neatly arranged, buttons fastened to the top or slightly loosened
Shirt cuffs visible 1-2 cm from the suit sleeves

Shoes and Socks:

✅ Black glossy leather shoes

Derby shoes or Oxford shoes
Highly polished, sharp reflection

✅ Black long socks (Refer to Figure 2 feature)

Clearly visible due to the cuffed hem
Solid color or fine stripe

Overall Style:

'High-end bespoke suit + relaxed fashionable details'
'Freedom within rigor'
'Refined but not stiff'

Accessories (Refined Details):
1. Thin-frame glasses (Recommended):

✅ Thin metal frame (gold/silver/black)
✅ Square or round frame
✅ Clear lenses
✅ Adds an 'intellectual fashion' atmosphere

2. Watch:

✅ Meta

content:
Prompt 1:
"Create a vertical, photorealistic New Year 2026 portrait set in Paris during winter, framed like a vintage New Year postcard. Preserve the exact identity of the subject or subjects with zero beautification or facial alteration, maintaining natural expressions, facial proportions, realistic skin texture, and true age.
Place the person on an authentic Parisian street with the Eiffel Tower clearly visible in the mid-background, softly glowing, instantly recognizable and naturally scaled (not oversized). Include classic Paris elements such as café terraces, warm street lamps, stone pavement, and subtle New Year décor like elegant lights, minimal garlands, or soft celebratory accents (no Christmas symbols). Dress the subject in natural winter outfits-stylish coats, scarves, and soft neutral layers suitable for late December, styled realistically and cohesively. Add gentle snowfall with small visible flakes, combining cool winter tones with warm golden street-lamp highlights to create a festive yet realistic New Year atmosphere. The lighting should feel cinematic but natural.
Apply subtle film grain, slight softness, and muted contrast to evoke a nostalgic printed photograph, not a modern digital look.
Frame the image with a tasteful aged postcard-style border. At the bottom, include elegant handwritten-style text reading exactly: "{argument name="postcard text" default="Happy New Year 2026"}"
The final image should feel warm, joyful, authentic, and celebratory, like a real moment captured during a New Year holiday trip-festive without appearing staged or artificial."

Prompt 2:
"A high-resolution photorealistic studio fashion portrait of an adult woman(match face) with long light brown hair with golden blonde highlights styled in loose curls, wearing a gold shimmering party hat. She wears a shimmering gold sequin party dress with a modern asymmetric cutout at the neckline.

The woman holds gold foil balloons shaped as the numbers 20 and 26 one in each hand, slightly raised near her shoulders. She looks off to the side with a playful, cheeky expression, lips pursed as if making a "thinking" face.
Neutral beige backdrop, clean studio environment, soft shadowing behind her. The balloons have realistic creases, highlights, and metallic shine.
Skin texture, hair strands, and sequins are sharply detailed.
No visible text or branding. Editorial-quality realism."
title: New Year 2026 Postcard and Studio Portrait Prompts
description: Two detailed prompts for New Year 2026 celebrations. Prompt 1 generates a nostalgic, photorealistic vertical postcard scene in Paris, emphasizing identity preservation and natural winter styling. Prompt 2 creates a high-resolution studio fashion portrait with gold party elements and specific posing.

content:
I. Theme and Emotion
1 Festive Theme: A fresh studio portrait celebrating the arrival of 2026, sweet, cute, relaxed, and playful.
2 Visual Temperament: Extreme minimalism (negative space), fashion editorial feel, clean, bright, gentle, and restrained.

II. Composition and Perspective
1 Aspect Ratio: Vertical, subject centered slightly lower, large area above reserved for text elements.
2 Composition Method: Primarily symmetrical and centered, the main subject is fully visible, feet and seat are visible, background negative space emphasizes the theme.
3 Depth of Field: Subject is sharp, background text is blurred to create layers and atmosphere.

III. Character and Pose
1 Character Setting: Young female, translucent and natural skin, light but refined makeup.
2 Expression and Action: Single eye winking, hands cupping the face in a flower-holding gesture, conveying playfulness and approachability.
3 Sitting Posture: Legs together and slightly tucked, body leaning forward slightly, overall line is compact and cute.

IV. Apparel and Styling
1 Main Clothing Color: {argument name="clothing color" default="Positive red"} thick cable-knit long dress or long sweater, covering to the calf, strong festive feel.
2 Accessory Details: Hair is half-up or symmetrically tied, paired with small dark hair accessories, overall simple.
3 Shoes and Socks: White mid-calf socks, black shiny round-toe shallow shoes, emphasizing vintage sweetness.

V. Scene and Props
1 Prop Selection: Transparent acrylic square stool, barely noticeable, enhancing minimalism and transparency.
2 Scene Type: Pure studio background without extra furnishings, emphasizing the subject and text theme.

VI. Background and Text Elements
1 Background Color: Warm light beige or light gray-beige, soft and non-glaring.
2 Text Design: Large handwritten cursive text running through the image. Text content: “{argument name="text content" default="2026 Hello!"}”
3 Text Function: Serves as a celebratory marker and visual rhythm line, enhancing layers and visual guidance.

VII. Lighting and Color
1 Lighting Style: Soft, uniform high-key studio lighting, very shallow shadows, smooth and three-dimensional facial features.
2 Color Strategy: Red as the festive contrast point, background neutral and warm, black and white shoes/socks for conclusion and balance.
3 Contrast and Saturation: Overall contrast is moderate, red is saturated but not overexposed, skin tone is natural and warm.

VIII. Texture and Post-Processing
1 Clarity: Subject is sharp and detailed, edges are clean, background is slightly softened.
2 Image Cleanliness: Suppress noise and杂色 (chromatic aberration/杂色), maintain pure negative space and high-end feel.
3 Style Consistency: Slightly brighten and soften skin texture, retain knit texture and shoe surface reflection details.

IX. Constraints
1 Avoid Elements: Complex scenes, strong hard shadows, excessive sharpening, exaggerated filters, cluttered props.
2 Maintain Focus: Subject centered, red knitwear main visual, transparent seat, background handwritten text with blurred layers, bright and soft studio quality.

content:
A city rendering digital art poster for 【{argument name="city name" default="city name"}】, with the Winter Solstice solar term as the overall background atmosphere.
The core subject of the image is a floating miniature island, shaped like the selected city and occupying most of the frame. The outline of the island is similar to the city's map shape, seamlessly integrating the city's unique iconic landmarks, natural landscapes, and cultural elements.
The miniature island is entirely carried or enveloped by the most representative traditional food imagery of the city during the Winter Solstice. Only one specific type of food should be chosen, determined by the city and regional culture (e.g., dumplings, tangyuan). Do not show a specific plate, but translate the form, texture, and structure of this oversized food into the island's shell, terrain, or supporting structure, making the city appear to grow upon this large Winter Solstice food item.
The island is placed within a realistic yet restrained Winter Solstice cooking scene based on the traditional food mentioned above, such as a stove, boiling pot/steamer, or soup pot in a daily kitchen environment. However, background elements are presented with blurring and soft focus, only hinting at the atmosphere of life and cooking. Steam and heat slowly rise, combining with warm winter lighting to create a quiet, warm, and human-touch solar term atmosphere.
Cinematic lighting, vibrant but restrained colors, aerial perspective, and winter light reflection effects. The number of buildings should not be too many or too dense.
The interior of the island showcases a seamless blend of history and modernity: one part presents the city's most representative ancient historical buildings; the other part naturally transitions into the city's landmark buildings and skyline view, all reflecting the current weather conditions (must confirm real weather conditions).
3D text of the city's Chinese name, formed by the steam from the pot, floats above the miniature island. The text acts like a miniature ecological device coexisting with the Winter Solstice, food, and city culture.
Around the frame and the main subject, add an information layout layer with a Winter Solstice festive atmosphere and local life feel, with the overall style conforming to traditional Chinese culture.
Automatically retrieve basic city information and Winter Solstice solar term information related to 【city name】, providing a simple introduction. Text layout uses an asymmetrical, naturally distributed arrangement, scattered around the edges and negative space of the frame, avoiding strict grids and centered composition.
In the corners or edges of the frame, present the city's geographical coordinates, alias, or founding year, and the weather and solar term reminder for the Winter Solstice day, in the style of a local festival poster or old calendar, as decorative information elements. The overall layout maintains significant negative space, but the atmosphere leans towards warmth, domesticity, and festivity.
The copywriting should be concise and refined.
Style requirements:
Octane Render, C4D, Isometric City, Micro World, Living Ecosystem, 8k Resolution, DreamWorks style, 3D modeling, delicate, soft light projection
Size: Vertical 9:16

The right three-quarters of the frame: the upper half presents an artistic display of keycaps: 5 to 7 exquisite mechanical keyboard keycaps scattered in the air in an elegant arc, each showing different angles and details. The keycap color scheme is extracted from the character's [{argument name="main color 1" default="cherry blossom pink"}], [{argument name="main color 2" default="creamy white"}], and [{argument name="accent color" default="coral red"}]. The keycap surfaces are printed with [{argument name="theme element" default="character Q-version silhouette/exclusive icon/gradient texture"}], presented using [{argument name="keycap material" default="PBT matte/resin translucent"}] material. Chinese artistic text annotations float next to each keycap, using Z-Cool Gao Duan Hei or YouShe Ti Hei fonts, with content such as "{argument name="annotation 1" default="Cherry Pink Main Key"}", "{argument name="annotation 2" default="Gradient Coating"}", "{argument name="annotation 3" default="Dual-Color Translucent"}", "{argument name="annotation 4" default="Character Print"}", "{argument name="annotation 5" default="Metal Spacebar"}", etc., describing the craftsmanship, with slight glow effects and outlines.

The lower right three-quarters of the frame are evenly divided into three areas: the left grid shows a top-down flat lay view of the complete mechanical keyboard, [{argument name="keyboard layout" default="68-key compact layout/anodized aluminum base"}], with the Chinese annotation "{argument name="left grid annotation" default="Complete Layout"}" at the bottom; the middle grid shows a macro close-up of the keyboard side profile, emphasizing craft details and material layers under light and shadow, with the annotation "{argument name="middle grid annotation" default="Ingenious Craftsmanship"}" at the bottom; the right grid shows an atmospheric setup of the keyboard in a [{argument name="scene 1" default="cozy desk scene/cafe table/workbench"}], with lifestyle props like [{argument name="props" default="coffee cup/green plant/notebook"}], with the annotation "{argument name="right grid annotation" default="Aesthetics of Life"}" at the bottom.

The overall background uses a [{argument name="background effect" default="ink wash/particle light effect/gradient matte"}] effect, with the main color transitioning from [{argument name="color 1" default="color 1"}] to [{argument name="color 2" default="color 2"}] extracted from the character, darker on the left and lighter on the right. Fine light spots and flowing color clouds are scattered in the background, creating a [{argument name="atmosphere" default="dreamy gentle/cyber tech/retro elegant"}] atmosphere. A large title text is centered at the bottom of the frame: "{argument name="main title" default="Character Name Themed Custom Keyboard"}", using bold Chinese artistic characters with a metallic texture or glowing effect.

The image has no obvious dividing lines, with areas naturally transitioning through light, shadow, depth of field, and visual reality. The overall presentation has the visual texture of a fashion magazine cover, with moderate color saturation, rich layers, combining both artistic and product display functions. 4K ultra-high resolution, 16:9 horizontal composition, suitable for social media impact.

content:
Generate a 9:16 vertical, realistic photo of a "Victorian Gothic Royal" portrait: Use the uploaded FACE_REF as the character identity reference, 100% restoring the facial features and bone structure; the person is wearing heavy-duty court attire in the style of the "Victorian Era (19th Century) Court Gown" (corset, large crinoline, lace/velvet, royal jewelry), photographed next to the Tower Bridge or the Palace of Westminster (Big Ben) in London. The image should have photography, styling, and cover design quality comparable to 'Harper’s Bazaar', maintaining the magazine's consistent design style (Chinese and English design).

【INPUTS | Input】
FACE_REF: Uploaded facial feature reference image (identity lock)

【ABSOLUTE PRIORITY | Identity Lock (Highest Priority)】
100% restoration of FACE_REF's facial features and bone structure: Eye distance, nose bridge and wings, lip shape, jawline, and cheekbone structure must be completely consistent, with no deviation.
Realistic skin texture: Visible subtle textures and pores; avoid excessive smoothing or 'influencer' filters.
Adult female image (adult).

【SHOT TYPE | Two View Options (Model randomly selects one, must be realistic and consistent)】
A) Half-body cover: From the chest to above the waist, with jewelry, lace neckline, and eyes being the clearest (Primary recommendation)
B) Full-body cover: Complete presentation from head to toe, showing the full silhouette of the huge crinoline combined with the London landmark, strong perspective (Alternative)
(Regardless of A/B: Must maintain a "cover composition," with white space reserved for typography, but without torn paper/hand-drawn effects.)

【LOCATION | Scene (London, UK)】
London Landmark: By the River Thames, with the magnificent Gothic architecture of the Palace of Westminster (Big Ben) or the Tower of London Bridge in the background.
Weather option (random): 1) London Fog (classic foggy texture, soft and mysterious light) 2) Just after rain (wet ground reflection, lead-gray sky)
Clean background: No tourists, no modern signs, no mobile phone status bar UI, no watermarks or subtitles.

【LIGHTING & CAMERA | Photographic Quality (Magazine Grade)】
Lens feel: 85mm portrait quality (half-body) or 50mm/70mm (full-body), shallow depth of field, eyes are the sharpest.
Lighting: Overcast diffused light + dramatic fill light (emphasizing facial structure); diamonds/gems must have realistic fire; velvet texture must be deep.
Color: High-end cinematic feel, low-saturation blue-gray environment combined with the dark tones of the clothing (red/blue/black) to form a Gothic aesthetic; overall clean, transparent, and luxurious.

【WARDROBE | Victorian Court Gown (Heavy-duty, Sculpting, Intricate Details)】
Target aesthetic: "Wasp waist, large skirt, layered lace, heavy velvet, crown, queenly aura."

Silhouette and Layers (X-shaped tailoring)
Upper body: Highly structured corset, square or high neckline, puff sleeves or leg-of-mutton sleeves
Lower body: Huge crinoline or bustle, with noticeable stacking design at the back waist, skirt trailing on the ground
Decoration: Abundant ruffles, bows, dangling tassels
Fabric and Craftsmanship (Heavy craftsmanship must be "visible")
Main fabric: Heavy velvet, taffeta, Chantilly Lace
Main techniques: Beading, gold thread embroidery, ribbon weaving
Pattern themes: Damask, roses, thistle (symbol of Scotland), paisley pattern
Details: Lace gloves, neck ornament (Choker), medal/brooch
Headwear (Royal Jewelry Headpiece)
Core structure: Victorian small crown (Tiara) or feather headpiece
Decoration: Diamonds, sapphires, pearls
Earrings/Necklace: Extremely exaggerated diamond necklace, drop earrings

【COLOR MATRIX | Color Matrix Pairing (Must be executed, and must be "Royal Dark Colors")】
(Deep luxury of the late Victorian era)
Randomly select 1 set from the following three "Main Color Schemes" for the [Base Color/Large Area Main Fabric Color].

Scheme G (Royal Blue Base):
Base Color: Deep sapphire blue/midnight blue (velvet texture)
Embroidery/Decoration: Silver lace, diamonds, sapphires
Scheme A (Victorian Red Base):
Base Color: Wine red/Burgundy red (deep passion)
Embroidery/Decoration: Black lace, gold embroidery, rubies
Scheme R (Mourning Black Base):
Base Color: Ink black (Black Jet, extremely Gothic)
Embroidery/Decoration: Black beads, black lace, small amounts of gold or silver highlights

【Color Execution Rules】
Colors must be deep and rich, reflecting the majesty of the "Empire on which the sun never sets" and Gothic mystery.

【POSE | Cover Pose (Majestic, Stiff, Queenly Aura)】
Half-body: Chin slightly raised, cold gaze, one hand gently touching the necklace
Full-body: Standing tall (like a portrait painting), hands clasped on the crinoline, overwhelming presence
Expression: Serious, arrogant, imperious; absolutely no smiling (Victorian style).

【OUTPUT | Output】
1 vertical 9:16 realistic magazine cover photo
Random: Half-body or Full-body (A/B selection)
Random: Fog or Rain (Weather selection)
Random: Sapphire Blue / Wine Red / Ink Black (Color matrix selection)
Styling: Victorian court gown direction + Crown/Choker + Corset and large crinoline + Velvet and lace

content:
Using my uploaded reference image as the base, generate a minimalist, high-quality commercial still life photograph with the aesthetic of a luxury brand advertisement.

Preserve the general shape, proportions, and main color scheme of the core product in the reference so that it is instantly recognizable as the same product, but upgrade the overall texture and atmosphere of the image, making it look like an ad for a top-tier international fragrance, skincare item, or high-end electronic product.

Use a vertical 4:5 composition. The background should be a large area of clean, neutral negative space, such as soft off-white, cool gray, or light beige, creating a quiet, restrained, and expensive studio environment. Apart from the core product and a minimal number of necessary supports, do not add any extra decorations. No clutter, no elaborate scene setup—only keep very simple geometric supports (such as a plain white cube, a cylinder, or a thin transparent panel). The supports must be simple and low-profile, existing only to hold and accentuate the product.

Strongly emphasize the material details of the product, and let the lighting fully serve those materials:
Show frosted glass with a fine, soft matte texture, ceramics with a matte or slightly glazed feel, and polished metal with clean, sharp specular highlights. Liquids should have clearly visible viscosity and volume. Avoid any cheap plastic feel, complex patterns, or gaudy stickers; the overall material quality must feel cool, restrained, and luxurious.

Use professional studio lighting: mainly soft, diffused light from softboxes, plus precise rim light outlining the product’s shape. The contours should be crisp and layered, and the shadows should be soft and clean, with no noise or dirty shadow patches. You may use a near-macro viewpoint, moving in closer to the product to highlight materials and details, while preserving ample negative space around the frame so the product can "speak for itself" in the emptiness.

Keep the overall color scheme neutral and calm. The product’s own color can be slightly more saturated, making it the single visual focal point in the scene. Do not use exaggerated gradient backgrounds, flashy colored lighting, or e-commerce promo aesthetics. No large-price text, labels, or cartoon graphics.

The final result must be a high-resolution commercial key visual that looks ready for a magazine back cover or a high-end brand announcement poster: minimalist, quiet, high-end, with the core product confidently centered, surrounded by clean negative space and precisely controlled lighting.
title: Luxury minimalist product photography based on a reference image
description: A prompt for generating high-end, minimalist commercial product photography in the style of luxury brand ads, using an uploaded reference image of the core product as the base.
